# Technical Concepts

## Documents

### font-config-hierarchy-concept.md
**Status:** Concept | **Created:** 2025-11-07

Technical concept describing the font configuration hierarchy problem and proposed three-tier smart merge solution: Default Fonts → fonts.yml → publish.yml with priority-based merging.

## Purpose

This directory contains conceptual documents that describe design approaches, technical strategies, and architectural decisions before implementation.
